title: ESPN's Bobby Marks on Changes in Boston
description:
ESPN's Front-Office Insider Bobby Marks joins The Woj Pod to discuss the challenges facing Boston's Brad Stevens with his elevation to run the franchise's basketball operations, the Clippers-Mavs, Lakers-Suns and anticipation for the Bucks-Nets series. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
